segments.text: We will go to climb up the hill tomorrow . Let's go to supermarket to buy some food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we can have a picnic on the top of the hill .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me see . We should go to buy some fruit first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is heavy and not convenient to take them to the top .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How about taking a cantaloupe ? It is light and sweet . Children love it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . We can buy some candy and nuts for children .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Look , cashew , peanuts , assorted biscuits , chocolate , canned goods , anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's enough for the kids . Get some drinks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . We should buy some yoghurt for kids .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Shall we buy some saucers ? It will be used during our picnic .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Four saucers . We can buy some custard tarts tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let's go to queue up . There are so many people in the lines .
segments.speaker: S2
